collectibles.title: Age of Ultron
collectibles.description: For years the heroes of the Marvel Universe have lived in fear that the artificial intelligence known as Ultron would one day evolve to fulfill its desire to wipe out all organic life and take over the Earth - that day has arrived. This massive 10-part Marvel Universe-spanning event is brought to you by Eisner award-winning writer Brian Michael Bendis and comics legend Bryan Hitch.
collectibles.author: Brian Michael Bendis

collectibles.title: Wolverine: Old Man Logan
collectibles.description: This character is an aged version of Wolverine set in an alternate future universe designated Earth-807128, where the supervillains overthrew the superheroes.
collectibles.author: Mark Millar

collectibles.title: House of M
collectibles.description: Collects House of M (2005) #1-8. The Scarlet Witch is out of control, and the fate of the entire world is in her hands. Will Magneto help his daughter or use her powers to his own benefit? Starring the Astonishing X-Men and the New Avengers!
collectibles.author: Brian Michael Bendis

collectibles.title: Secret Wars Omnibus
collectibles.description: Collects Marvel Super Heroes Secret Wars #1-12, Thor (1966) #383, She-Hulk (2004) #10 and WHAT IF? (1989) #4 and #114. Drawn from Earth across the stars, the Marvel Universe's greatest heroes and villains are set against one another by the mysterious and all-powerful Beyonder - with the winner promised the ultimate prize! But as battle lines are drawn, new alliances are forged and old enemies clash, one among them is not willing to settle for anything less than godhood. Can even the combined might of the Avengers, Spider-Man, the Fantastic Four and the X-Men prevent Doctor Doom from becoming the most powerful being in the universe? The greatest super hero war of all time is collected alongside an untold chapter of Thor's time on Battleworld, Titania's incredible origin and 'What If?' tales that offer very different endings to the Secret Wars!
collectibles.author: Jim Shooter

collectibles.title: Spider-Punk
collectibles.description: SPIDER-PUNK GETS HIS OWN SERIES! HOBIE BROWN is THE ANARCHIC SPIDER-PUNK — set to protect EARTH-138 with his ax in hand and his chaotic band of punk rockin’ heroes backing him! NORMAN OSBORN is dead, but will the chaos he’s created be too much for Spider-Punk and gang to handle? Feel the vibes as CODY ZIGLAR (AMAZING SPIDER-MAN) and JUSTIN MASON bring you the jams when “BANNED IN DC” begins here!
collectibles.author: Ziglar Cody

collectibles.title: Infinity Gauntlet Omnibus
collectibles.description: Death has released Thanos from her cold embrace, and he plans to repay her by murdering half the universe! But even as the Mad Titan gathers the six Infinity Gems from across the galaxy, assembling them into the Infinity Gauntlet and gaining truly godlike powers, a host of heroes gather to oppose him — including the Silver Surfer, Adam Warlock, Gamora, Drax the Destroyer, Doctor Strange and the Hulk! Even with Doctor Doom, Galactus and the universe’s cosmic powers aiding them, can Marvel’s mightiest possibly prevail against Thanos the all-powerful? The fan-favorite cosmic event is collected in its entirety!
collectibles.author: Jim Starlin

collectibles.title: Planet of the Apes
collectibles.description: A new era of apes kicks off with part 1 of “Devolution”! The ALZ-113 virus has rampaged across planet Earth, and humanity is crumbling. While well-meaning researchers hunt for a cure, a fanatical group of humans has their own solution: Kill all apes. Peacekeeper Juliana Tobon is one of the few willing to stand against them, but the crisis is spreading, and soon apes will witness the true depths of human cruelty… Eisner-winning writer David F. Walker (Luke Cage, Bitter Root) joins forces with artist Dave Wachter (Iron Fist: Heart of the Dragon, Star Wars: The High Republic – Trail of Shadows) on one of the most beloved sci-fi franchises in history!
collectibles.author: David Walker

collectibles.title: Captain America
collectibles.description: When Arnim Zola launches a catastrophic attack on New York City, he meets his match – in Sam Wilson and Steve Rogers! In the explosive battle that follows, two Captain Americas prove better than one, and Sam and Steve decide they might just keep a good thing going…Tochi Onyebuchi (BLACK PANTHER LEGENDS), Jackson Lanzing & Collin Kelly (KANG THE CONQUEROR) and Mattia De Iulis (THE MIGHTY VALKYRIES, INVISIBLE WOMAN) kick off an incredible new CAPTAIN AMERICA saga – you won’t want to miss what comes next!
collectibles.author: Collin Kelly, Jackson Lanzing, Tochi Onyebuchi

collectibles.title: Invincible Iron Man
collectibles.description: Tony Stark, the genius-billionaire-playboy-philanthropist, has lost it all: his wealth…his fame…his friends. But Stark doesn’t realize he still has so much more to lose, especially when the assassins start to come for him! It’s the beginning of the end, as the Golden Avenger must fight for his life and find out what it really means to hit rock bottom. Join Gerry Duggan (X-Men) and Juan Frigeri (Avengers) as they take Iron Man to the darkest corners of the Marvel Universe yet!
collectibles.author: Gerry Duggan

collectibles.title: Star Wars: Revelations
collectibles.description: The can’t-miss star wars issue of the year! After WAR OF THE BOUNTY HUNTERS came CRIMSON REIGN…now in the midst of HIDDEN EMPIRE, Qi’ra has shaken the galactic landscape to its core! But what lies beyond for the Rebellion? For the Empire? What role do the bounty hunters play? And what is happening to Doctor Aphra? Witness the next step in the legacy of heroes and scoundrels in the galaxy far, far away as Marc Guggenheim (Han Solo & Chewbacca) is joined by a ragtag team of artists to bring you an explosive tale you won’t soon forget! The path to the future of STAR WARS starts here!
collectibles.author: Marc Guggenheim

collectibles.title: Avengers
collectibles.description: Thor Odinson. Steve Rogers. Tony Stark. The Big Three of the Avengers are reunited at last! And just in time to save the world from total annihilation at the hands of their most powerful enemies yet: the 2000-foot-tall space gods known as Celestials. Behold the coming of the Final Host. Who will answer the call to assemble for a wild new era of Earth's Mightiest Heroes? Hint: one of them has a flaming skull for a head. And what strange, world-shaking connection exists between the Final Host and Odin's ancient band of Prehistoric Avengers?
collectibles.author: Jason Aaron

collectibles.title: Star Wars: Visions
collectibles.description: Takashi Okazaki (Afro Samurai) is continuing his storytelling from the acclaimed STAR WARS: VISIONS episode “The Duel,” featuring the Ronin! The mythology of STAR WARS infused with elements of Feudal Japan makes this issue a must read for Star Wars and manga fans alike!
collectibles.author: Takashi Okazaki

collectibles.title: Original Sin
collectibles.description: WHO SHOT THE WATCHER? The Watcher, the mysterious space-god who's been watching us from the moon for as long as we can remember... is dead. Thus begins the greatest murder mystery in Marvel Comics history. As Nick Fury leads the heroes of the Marvel Universe in an investigation, other forces are marshaling as well and other questions are arising. Why is Black Panther gathering a secret team of his own, including Emma Frost, the Punisher and Dr. Strange? Who is the Unseen? What was the Original Sin? What was stolen from the Watcher's lair? And most importantly, who now holds the Marvel Universe's darkest secrets in the palm of their hand? SEE VARIANT COVERS
collectibles.author: Jason Aaron

collectibles.title: Sensational She-Hulk
collectibles.description: INCREDIBLE AND SENSATIONAL! The Incredible Hulk comes for his cousin, and it's not a social call! Both Hulk books collide! What villain is brave enough to bait the two strongest heroes (one with way better hair) of the Marvel Universe?! PLUS: In honor of Native/Indigenous Heritage Month, the Best Friend of the Marvel Universe and She-Hulk's ex-boyfriend WYATT WINGFOOT makes his triumphant return in a bonus story!
collectibles.author: Rainbow Rowell

collectibles.title: X-Men: Before the Fall - Heralds of Apocalypse
collectibles.description: THE ORIGIN OF ARAKKO! In ancient days, Genesis turned back the hordes of Amenth. In ancient days, Genesis forced Annihilationin to a parley. What words were spoken in her mind? Now, finally, Apocalypse will know…and the echoes of those words might destroy him…and Arakko with him.
collectibles.author: Al Ewing

collectibles.title: Batman: The Killing Joke
collectibles.description: Alan Moore cemented his reputation for unparalleled storytelling with wildly acclaimed books such as WATCHMEN and V FOR VENDETTA. Here he takes on some of DC's most classic characters, offering his unforgettable version of the disturbing relationship between the Dark Knight and his greatest foe, the Joker. In this groundbreaking work, Moore creates a twisted tale of insanity and human perseverance. Looking to prove that any man can be pushed past his breaking point to madness, the Joker attempts to drive Commissioner Gordon insane. Refusing to give up, Gordon struggles to maintain his sanity with the help of Batman in a desperate effort to best the madman.
collectibles.author: Alan Moore

collectibles.title: Flashpoint
collectibles.description: The red-hot, sold-out five-issue miniseries from Geoff Johns and Andy Kubert is back in a new hardcover!This is Flash Fact: When Barry Allen wakes at his desk, he discovers the world has changed. Family is alive, loved ones are strangers, and close friends are different, gone or worse. It's a world on the brink of a cataclysmic war – but where are Earth's Greatest Heroes to stop it?It's a place where America's last hope is Cyborg, who hopes to gather the forces of The Outsider, The Secret 7, S!H!A!Z!A!M!, Citizen Cold and other new and familiar-yet-altered faces! It's a world that could be running out of time, if The Flash can't find the villain who altered the time line!
collectibles.author: Geoff Johns

collectibles.title: Superman: The Death Of Superman
collectibles.description: Doomsday. A creature with a single-minded purpose of death and destruction. He has landed on Earth, laying waste to anything—and anyone—who dares stand in his way. The Justice League makes a valiant, but ultimately desperate, attempt to stop the unknown juggernaut. When the beast nears Metropolis, Superman answers the call to stop him. And then the unthinkable happens. The Man of Steel…dies.
collectibles.author: Dan Jurgens

collectibles.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
collectibles.description: One year ago, the Guardians of the Galaxy were destroyed. Their optimistic future shattered by the betrayal of one of their own. Now they ride the space lanes of a lawless corner of the galaxy, trying to outrun their tragedy. Can they rediscover their heroism and humanity on the bleakest frontier? Can they forgive the failures of their past? Or will they fade into the dark, eternally unforgiven? Writers JACKSON LANZING and COLLIN KELLY (CAPTAIN AMERICA: SENTINEL OF LIBERTY) team up with artist KEV WALKER (PREDATOR) for a Guardians story like no other!
collectibles.author: Jackson Lanzing, Collin Kelly

collectibles.title: Batman: The Weedding
collectibles.description: In these tales from BATMAN #45-50, Booster Gold arrives in Gotham City to give Bruce Wayne a gift—the kind that could have deadly consequences! Then, just as the Bat and the Cat are starting to think it might be easier to just elope than go through with their wedding plans, The Joker kidnaps his old foe—but will he try to talk him out of his marriage plans, or just bash his brains in? It all concludes in the historic wedding issue! Includes the wedding prelude story from DC NATION #0
collectibles.author: Tom King

collectibles.title: Batman: Three Jokers
collectibles.description: Thirty years after Batman: The Killing Joke changed comics forever, Batman: Three Jokers reexamines the myth of who, or what, is the Joker and what is at the heart of his ongoing battle with Batman? New York Times bestselling writer Geoff Johns and artist Jason Fabok, the team that waged the “Darkseid War” in the pages of Justice League, reunite to tell the ultimate story of Batman and the Joker! In this highly anticipated epic, learn why there are three Jokers, and what that means for the decades-long battle between the Dark Knight and the Clown Prince of Crime. In this powerful, emotional story, Batman, Batgirl, and Red Hood—all past victims of the Joker—work together to solve a mystery unlike anything they've ever faced before!
collectibles.author: Geoff Johns

collectibles.title: Constantine: Distorted Illusions
collectibles.description: Constantine is not your average bad boy… John Constantine is, and has always been, a magician of the highest caliber—who doesn't need additional training from any highbrow magician, thank you very much. Sensing an opportunity for independence, Constantine falsely accepts an apprenticeship in the United States to instead become the lead singer of his best friend's punk band, Mucous Membrane. When the band begins to dabble in magic, a complicated spell gets out of hand…and the disastrous consequences might be more than Constantine can handle.
collectibles.author: Kami Garcia

collectibles.title: Wonder Woman Warkiller
collectibles.description: Wonder Woman and Black Canary go undercover among some of the worst villains of the DC Universe in this title collecting WONDER WOMAN #34-39! Plus, Diana must fight for her life against the man destined by the gods to take her place: Achilles, the Warkiller.
collectibles.author: Gail Simone

collectibles.title: Superboy: Trouble In Paradaise
collectibles.description: In the aftermath of the “Death of Superman” and the return of the Man of Steel, the new Superboy moves to Hawaii! But as his powers develop, the young clone of Superman must learn to be a hero as he battles villains including Sidearm and Knockout, and faces the effects of the dread clone plague! Collects issues #0-11.
collectibles.author: Eddie Berganza, Karl Kesel

collectibles.title: Batman: Arkham - Scarecrow
collectibles.description: The Scarecrow, one of the Dark Knight's greatest foes, stars in this new best-of collection that includes tales from DETECTIVE COMICS #73, 389, 486 and 540, BATMAN #189, 296, 373, 523 and 524, DETECTIVE COMICS #23.3, BATMAN ANNUAL #19, JOKER'S ASYLUM: SCARECROW #1 and WORLD'S FINEST COMICS #3!
collectibles.author: Various

collectibles.title: Aquamen
collectibles.description: Dive deeper following the thrilling conclusions of Aquaman: The Becoming and Black Manta! When a terrorist in Middle America is revealed as an Atlantean sleeper agent seemingly gone rogue, the Aquamen—Arthur Curry and Jackson Hyde—are on the case. But it soon becomes clear that the tragedy was not just a single bad actor, but the beginnings of a much larger and more dangerous chain reaction…and the heart of an explosive Atlantean conspiracy! If Arthur's not careful, the secrets he's keeping—from Mera, Tula, Tempest, Atlantis, the surface, and even Jackson—could cause a rift from which the Aquamen might never recover!
collectibles.author: Brandon Thomas

collectibles.title: Injustice: Gods Among Us
collectibles.description: The first year of the acclaimed prequel to the video game Injustice: Gods Among Us is collected! The world is changed forever when Superman is tricked into destroying the thing he loves most. Now, the heroes of our world must decide if they are with Superman or against him.
collectibles.author: Tom Taylor

collectibles.title: He-Man And The Masters Of The Universe
collectibles.description: He-Man And The Masters Of The Universe return to comics in an all-new miniseries! • SKELETOR strikes with his master plan to rule ETERNIA! • Can ADAM and the MASTERS OF THE UNIVERSE remember what ETERNIA was like in time to save it?
collectibles.author: James Robinson

collectibles.title: Thundercats: Dogs Of War
collectibles.description: The 'Cats hold on fans of '80s animation continues! When a vicious gang of warriors known as the Dogs of War threatens to shatter the idyllic peace of Thundera, Lion-O may be forced to call on his old foe Mumm-Ra for aid. Will this union be enough to fend off the pack of heinous hounds?
collectibles.author: John Layman

collectibles.title: Stranger Things Vecna 1/4 Scale Statue
collectibles.description: Kinetiquettes presents their first Stranger Things statue, Vecna. Depicting the pervasive presence of the Upside-Down, this highly detailed statue was sculpted by the prevalent Franco Carlesimo. With Venca's Demogorgons and Demobats, he seemingly rises to control them with his hive mind.
collectibles.author: Franco Carlesimo

collectibles.title: Stranger Things: Ghostbusters
collectibles.description: Mike, Will, Lucas, and Dustin return in season 2 of the Netflix hit series, Stranger Things with a bang. One gloomy Halloween night in Hawkins,Indiana, Mike, Will, Lucas, and Dustin decide to dress up as their favorite characters from the iconic movie but little do they know that Halloween will never be the same again. The Ghostbuster Deluxe Box features the 4 fan-favorite characters in the iconic Ghostbuster jumpsuits that were made so popular in the 1984 hit movie, Ghostbusters.
collectibles.author: McFarlane

collectibles.title: Iron Man Mark LXXXV Battle Damaged Version
collectibles.description: Drawing inspiration from the epic moments of Avengers: Endgame, Sideshow and Hot Toys are pleased to present the battle-damaged version of the 1:6 scale collectible figure of Iron Man Mark LXXXV as the latest addition to the ever-expanding Marvel Cinematic Universe line.
collectibles.author: Hot Toys

collectibles.title: White Ranger- Mighty Morphin Power Rangers
collectibles.description: Sideshow, Threezero, and Hasbro are pleased to offer the next figure in the 1:6 scale articulated toy series based on the classic American superhero TV series, Mighty Morphin Power Rangers.
collectibles.author: Threezero and Hasbro

collectibles.title: The Joker
collectibles.description: Sideshow and Tweeterhead present The Joker 1:4 Maquette, a charming and crazy Sideshow exclusive statue to add to your DC Comics collection.
collectibles.author: Tweeterhead

collectibles.title: John Stewart - Green Lantern
collectibles.description: Tweeterhead presents the new 1:6 scale maquette of John Stewart - Green Lantern. Leader of the Green Lantern Corps!
collectibles.author: Tweeterhead

collectibles.title: Tony Stark Mark VII Suit-Up Version - The Avengers
collectibles.description: Sideshow and Hot Toys are pleased to present the 1:6 scale collectible figure of Tony Stark Mark VII Suit-Up Version based on The Avengers.
collectibles.author: Hot Toys

collectibles.title: Spider Punk - Across the Spider-Verse Marvel Diorama Stage by Beast Kingdom
collectibles.description: To celebrate the release of the latest movie, 'Across The Spider-Verse', Beast Kingdom is ready to launch a rocker Diorama Stage figure that will rock the house with some sweet guitar riffs.
collectibles.author: Beast Kingdom

collectibles.title: Luke Skywalker Deluxe - Star Wars: The Mandalorian
collectibles.description: Sideshow and Hot Toys are delighted to expand The Mandalorian collectible series and present the highly anticipated 1:6 scale collectible figure of Luke Skywalker Deluxe as the latest addition to our premium DX series!
collectibles.author: Hot Toys

collectibles.title: Catwoman Bonus Version - Batman Returns Museum Masterline
collectibles.description: Prime 1 Studio and Blitzway have exceeded all expectations and delivered the most astonishingly accurate depiction of Michelle Pfeiffer's Catwoman from Batman Returns in 1992!
collectibles.author: Prime 1 Studio and Blitzway

collectibles.title: Mr. Sinister - X-Men
collectibles.description: Iron Studios is proud to present the Mr. Sinister statue straight from Marvel's X-Men at a 1:10 scale, featuring the master villain of manipulation and strategic thinking, one of the most requested characters by fans and collectors.
collectibles.author: Iron Studios

collectibles.title: Yoda - Star Wars - Legendary
collectibles.description: Sideshow presents the Yoda™ Legendary Scale™ figure, a 1:2 scale Star Wars™ collectible that brings the action of the galactic conflict to your collection.
collectibles.author: Sideshow

collectibles.title: Queen Alien Battle - Aliens Diorama
collectibles.description: Prime 1 Studio is proud to present an addition to our Premium Masterline series, the mighty Queen Alien Battle Diorama from the Aliens franchise!
collectibles.author: Prime 1 Studio

collectibles.title: Monkey D. Luffy & Silvers Rayleigh - One Piece
collectibles.description: Sideshow and Jimei Palace are excited to present the Monkey D. Luffy & Silvers Rayleigh statue!
collectibles.author: Sideshow and Jimei Palace

collectibles.title: Harry Potter Deluxe - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
collectibles.description: InArt is pleased to present the 1:6 scale Deluxe Version collectible figure of Harry Potter, to prepare you for this epic journey into the magical world of Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone.
collectibles.author: InArt

collectibles.title: Doc Brown - Back to the Future
collectibles.description: Sideshow and Iron Studios are proud to announce the latest from the 1:10 Art Scale line: the Doc Brown statue! From Back to the Future, the Doc Brown Art Scale statue is a limited edition, highly detailed, and hand-painted collectible.
collectibles.author: Sideshow and Iron Studios

collectibles.title: Marty McFly - Back to the Future
collectibles.description: Sideshow and Iron Studios are proud to announce the latest from the 1:10 Art Scale line: the Marty McFly statue! From Back to the Future, the Marty McFly Art Scale statue is a limited edition, highly detailed, and hand-painted collectible.
collectibles.author: Sideshow and Iron Studios

collectibles.title: Rocket and Cosmo - Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
collectibles.description: Drawing inspiration from the notably fun gang, Sideshow and Hot Toys are presenting the 1:6 scale collectible figure of Rocket from Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3.
collectibles.author: Sideshow and Hot Toys

collectibles.title: Darth Vader - Star Wars: Obi-Wan Kenobi
collectibles.description: Sideshow and Iron Studios are proud to announce the latest from the Battle Diorama Series Art Scale 1:10 line: Darth Vader! This Star Wars collectible art scale statue is a limited edition and comes with a detailed hand-painted base.
collectibles.author: Sideshow and Iron Studios

collectibles.title: Cyclops Unleashed Deluxe - X-Men
collectibles.description: Sideshow and Iron Studios are proud to announce the latest from the 1:10 Art Scale line: Cyclops Unleashed Deluxe! From Marvel Comics, the Cyclops Unleashed Deluxe Art Scale Statue is a limited edition and comes with a detailed hand-painted base.
collectibles.author: Sideshow and Iron Studios

collectibles.title: Donatello 1990 - TMNT
collectibles.description: Cowabunga, buddy! NECA is proud to announce its first action figures based on the classic Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles movie.
collectibles.author: NECA

collectibles.title: Kang - Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
collectibles.description: Inspired by Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania, Sideshow and Hot Toys bring the 1:6 scale figure of Kang from the Quantum Realm
collectibles.author: Sideshow and Hot Toys

collectibles.title: Superman: The Movie Premium Format Figure
collectibles.description: Sideshow presents the Superman: The Movie Premium Format figure, bringing hope to your DC Comics collectibles line.
collectibles.author: Sideshow

collectibles.title: Sorcerer Mickey Deluxe - Disney Fantasy
collectibles.description: A Disney classic revered to this day as one of the seminal animated films in cinema history, Iron Studios proudly presents the Mickey Fantasia statue.
collectibles.author: Iron Studios

collectibles.title: Leon S. Kennedy - Resident Evil: Vendetta
collectibles.description: A synonym for the survival horror genre, the Resident Evil series has shipped over 131 million units worldwide.
collectibles.author: Kotobukiya

collectibles.title: Chris Redfield - Resident Evil: Vendetta
collectibles.description: Now, Chris Redfield, the main character from the CG animated movie Resident Evil Vendetta, joins Kotobukiya's lineup as a PVC statue.
collectibles.author: Kotobukiya

collectibles.title: Will Byers - Stranger Things
collectibles.description: Will is captured by a creature from the 'Upside Down' and then develops a connection with the Upside Down and the Mind Flayer.
collectibles.author: three Zero

collectibles.title: Eleven - Stranger Things
collectibles.description: For years the heroes of the Marvel Universe have lived in fear that the artificial intelligence known as Ultron would one day evolve to fulfill its desire to wipe out all organic life and take over the Earth - that day has arrived. This massive 10-part Marvel Universe-spanning event is brought to you by Eisner award-winning writer Brian Michael Bendis and comics legend Bryan Hitch.
collectibles.author: three Zero

collectibles.title: Dustin Henderson - Stranger Things
collectibles.description: The 1:6 scale collectible figure of Dustin Henderson from Stranger Things measures approximately 9.2 inches (~23 cm) tall and features a fully articulated original body with 28 points of articulation and fabric clothing.
collectibles.author: three Zero

collectibles.title: Demogorgon - Stranger Things
collectibles.description: This creature emerged from the Upside Down and stands at approximately 16 inches tall, featuring a fully articulated original body with over 24 points of articulation. The joints in the torso, elbow, and ankle are cleverly hidden under soft PVC and utilize a realistic multi-layered paint application to enhance the creature's intimidating lifelike appearance.
collectibles.author: three Zero

collectibles.title: Sloth and Chunk - The Goonies
collectibles.description: From the '80s cult classic, Iron Studios is proud to present the Sloth and Chunk 1/10 Scale Art Scale Statue.
collectibles.author: Iron Studios

collectibles.title: Rex and Donald Gennaro - Jurassic Park
collectibles.description: Iron Studios proudly presents its new 'Rex and Donald Gennaro Demi' statue. In the pouring rain of a storm on the wild Isla Nublar, a gigantic and relentless prehistoric carnivorous predator, recreated through modern genetic engineering as an attraction in a safari and zoo-themed park, breaks through its containment fence and gazes intently for a few seconds at its first human prey, trembling in fear and desperation in such an unusual situation just before being devoured.
collectibles.author: Iron Studios

collectibles.title: Joel and Ellie - The Last of Us Part II
collectibles.description: In The Last of Us Part II, players experience the devastating physical and emotional consequences of Ellie's quest for revenge as she embarks on an unrelenting pursuit of those who have wronged her.
collectibles.author: NECA

collectibles.title: Captain Carter - What If...?
collectibles.description: Beautifully designed based on Captain Carter's appearance in the animated series, the figure features a newly developed sculpted head and interchangeable curly brown hair sculptures with an impressive likeness, a finely tailored outfit in a red, blue, and white color scheme, Captain Carter's signature shield, a pistol, and a figure stand.
collectibles.author: Sideshow and Hot Toys

collectibles.title: Mace Windu - Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
collectibles.description: A somber Jedi Master™ with an amethyst-bladed lightsaber, Mace Windu was the champion of the Jedi Order™, with little tolerance for the Senate's failings, politicians' arguments, or the opinions of rogue Jedi. As the Clone Wars escalated, Mace felt the dark side of the Force in action and knew that the enemies of the Jedi were conspiring to destroy the Order and end their administration of the galaxy.
collectibles.author: Hot Toys

collectibles.title: Padmé Amidala - Star Wars: Attack of the Clones
collectibles.description: This incredible Star Wars action figure, beautifully developed based on Padmé's on-screen appearance in the movie, features a newly designed sculpted head with an astonishing likeness and a movable eyeball function that allows for poseable eye lines, a specially designed outfit that Padmé wore on Geonosis, two styles of blasters, a pair of handcuffs with a chain, a display stand themed to the Geonosian™ factory, and special commemorative packaging.
collectibles.author: Sideshow and Hot Toys

collectibles.title: Pennywise - It: Chapter 2
collectibles.description: Sideshow and Hot Toys present the 1:6 scale collectible figure of Pennywise!
collectibles.author: Sideshow and Hot Toys

collectibles.title: Krang - TMNT
collectibles.description: Unmistakable and intimidating, Sideshow and Iron Studios present the Krang 1:10 Art Scale Statue, one of the most dangerous antagonistic enemies of the mutant teenage Ninja Turtles, with his bulky robotic body that brings a pair of interchangeable claw-shaped hands and a morning star.
collectibles.author: Sideshow and Iron Studios

collectibles.title: Caesar 2.0 Deluxe - Rise of the Planet of the Apes
collectibles.description: Rise of the Planet of the Apes sees the genetically modified baby chimpanzee, Caesar, grow into the leader of the simian uprising determined to overthrow their human oppressors.
collectibles.author: Sideshow and Star Ace Toys

collectibles.title: Dorothy Deluxe - Wizard Of Oz
collectibles.description: Based on the original 1900 book, considered the first American fairy tale, in a rural Kansas farm, the story's protagonist and heroine Dorothy, a teenage orphan, along with her pet dog Toto, are swept away with their house by a cyclone. Whisked away by the heart of the storm, the house spins until it lands, and Dorothy realizes she's no longer in Kansas and must have passed over the Rainbow. She finds herself in a place with bright blue skies, beautiful green hills, tall trees with juicy fruits, giant flowers in a wondrous landscape. Glinda, the beautiful Good Witch of the North, appears before her and informs her that she's in the magical land of Oz and that her house has fallen on the Wicked Witch of the East and killed her.
collectibles.author: Iron Studios

collectibles.title: Gandalf the White - The Lord Of The Rings
collectibles.description: Lord of the Rings fans, don't miss the chance to add this Gandalf collectible to your Lord of the Rings collectibles display!
collectibles.author: Sideshow and Asmus Toys

collectibles.title: Legolas at Helm's Deep - The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
collectibles.description: Legolas at Helm's Deep 1:6 scale features an authentic and fully detailed, highly realistic likeness of Legolas from The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers. This figure stands approximately 30 cm tall and depicts Legolas ready for battle.
collectibles.author: Sideshow and Asmus Toys

collectibles.title: Frodo and Gollum: The Lord of the Rings - The Return of the King
collectibles.description: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King is the culmination of the magnificent 'The Lord of the Rings' trilogy by the esteemed director Peter Jackson. The scene where, unable to kill Frodo, Gollum leads the unsuspecting Hobbit to the lair of the spider demon Shelob! Prime1 Studio skillfully captures the moment when a vulnerable but brave Frodo Baggins ventures into Cirith Ungol, unaware of the betrayal that is about to befall him. Gollum incites Frodo to enter the spider's lair; his plan is to steal the ring from Frodo after he has fallen prey to the spider demon. The sudden concern on Frodo's face and Gollum's malicious intent to harm him have been captured by the talented sculptors at Prime1 Studio. They used synthetic hair not only on Frodo's Hobbit feet but also on Gollum's head to enhance the statue's superior quality.
collectibles.author: Prime 1 Studio

collectibles.title: Ada Wong - Resident Evil
collectibles.description: Sideshow, Nauts, and Damtoys team up to bring you the 1:6 scale collectible figure series of Ada Wong from the popular CAPCOM game Resident Evil 2, which includes a faithfully detailed head, sculpted weapons, and accessories.
collectibles.author: Sideshow, Nauts, and Damtoys

collectibles.title: Claire Redfield - Classic Version: Resident Evil 2
collectibles.description: This classic edition of the Claire Redfield figure features a highly detailed and articulated body with over 30 points of articulation, allowing fans to recreate their favorite moments from the cult classic survival horror game. A fully tailored costume lets you model Claire as she appears in the original 1998 version as well as in the new 2019 version, and an incredible array of weapons and accessories make this a video game figure you won't want to miss!
collectibles.author: Sideshow, Nauts, and Damtoys

collectibles.title: Leon S. Kennedy - Classic Version: Resident Evil 2
collectibles.description: This classic edition of Leon features a highly detailed and articulated body with over 30 points of articulation, allowing fans to recreate their favorite moments from the cult classic survival horror game. A fully tailored RPD uniform and an incredible array of weapons and accessories make this a video game figure you won't want to miss!
collectibles.author: Sideshow, Nauts, and Damtoys

collectibles.title: Skeletor Legends - Master of the Universe
collectibles.description: The Skeletor Maquette measures 25 inches in height and 15.4 inches in width, dominating a Snake Mountain base adorned with two snake heads spewing molten lava. He wields the Havoc Staff, topped with a silver ram's skull and a purple crystal ball. Despite his skeletal face, the villain has a muscular blue body protected by ornate silver armor and a sculpted purple cape that adds an extra air of malevolence and magnificence.
collectibles.author: Sideshow and Tweeterhead

collectibles.title: Green Goblin Upgraded Suit - Spider-Man: No Way Home
collectibles.description: A spell by Doctor Strange goes terribly wrong and releases the most powerful villains who have ever fought against Spider-Man in any universe. Out of his Goblin mask, Norman Osborn wears a poncho over the characteristic green suit with upgraded equipment. This cunning and dangerous villain, who poses a significant threat to the world, is trying to push Peter Parker to his moral limits.
collectibles.author: Hot Toys

collectibles.title: Luke Skywalker (Snowspeeder Pilot) - Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back
collectibles.description: The highly accurate Luke Skywalker collectible figure is expertly crafted based on his appearance in the movie, featuring a newly sculpted head with hair sculpture, a finely tailored Snowspeeder outfit, a life support unit on the chest, a LED-lit lightsaber, an interchangeable lightsaber blade that emulates the weapon in motion, a highly detailed flight helmet, a blaster pistol, a gripping hand, a thermal detonator, a snow-themed diorama setup with a figure stand, all in a specially designed retro-style package!
collectibles.author: Sideshow and Hot Toys

collectibles.title: Magneto - X-Men
collectibles.description: The 1:6 scale Magneto figure features a tailored fabric costume, including a red suit with textured patterns, purple shorts, and an articulated purple cape with wire. The costume is detailed with sculpted elements like his metallic purple belt and mantle, as well as sculpted boots and wristbands. Magneto also comes with seven different hands, including a pair of fists, a pair of flight hands, a pair of crushing hands, and a left hand with a non-removable levitation effect.
collectibles.author: Sideshow

collectibles.title: Dead Defender Strange - Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
collectibles.description: Possessing the cadaverous body and already showing signs of decomposition from his counterpart in another world, Dr. Stephen Strange uses the knowledge of the Darkhold, the Book of the Damned conceived in the Hell-dimension, to control evil spirits drawn by a forbidden spell, and use it to confront the deranged Scarlet Witch.
collectibles.author: Iron Studios

collectibles.title: Superboy
collectibles.description: Upon a base shaped like twisted metal, made from the remains of the robotic Kryptonian supervillain Brainiac's skull, or one of his mechanical creations, a powerful young hero soars with his snug blue and red suit, bearing the unmistakable 'S'-shield emblem on his chest, and a distinctive black leather jacket to express his rebellious identity.
collectibles.author: Iron Studios

collectibles.title: Zero - Mega Man X
collectibles.description: The 1:4 scale Zero Deluxe statue measures 30inches in height and 18 inches in width as the iconic hero stands within Dr. Light's construction capsule. Zero, an elite Maverick Hunter, is a powerful android dedicated to protecting humanity from criminal Reploids. This detailed statue showcases Zero's unique construction as the mechanical arms complete their diagnosis in this high-tech chamber.
collectibles.author: Sideshow and Premium Collectibles Studio

collectibles.title: Mega Man X Collector's Edition
collectibles.description: The 1:4 scale Mega Man X statue from the collector's edition stands 17 inches in height and 10 inches in width, positioned on a sleek black statue base. As one of the Maverick Hunters, Mega Man X is a technologically advanced Reploid capable of independent thought and feeling. This detailed statue showcases X's unique construction, with silver unarmored limbs, as well as the iconic blue armor that gives the hero his distinctive silhouette.
collectibles.author: Sideshow and Premium Collectibles Studio

collectibles.title: Roronoa Zoro DXF Grandline Wanokuni Vol 4 B - One Piece
collectibles.description: From the successful anime series One Piece comes a Wanokuni Roronoa Zoro figure! It is sculpted with great detail featuring an outfit from the Wano Country arc.
collectibles.author: Banpresto

collectibles.title: Monkey D. Luffy - One Piece Film Red DXF The Grandline Men
collectibles.description: Monkey D. Luffy embarks on the One Piece adventure as a figure from the DXF The Grandline Men Collection!
collectibles.author: Banpresto

collectibles.title: Link - The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword
collectibles.description: From the classic action-adventure game The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword comes a new 1/7 scale figure of the main character, Link! The unique style of the game's key art has come to life with intricate sculpting and careful painting to recreate the appearance of shadows and textures in perfect detail; this figure oozes high quality for game fans.
collectibles.author: Good Smile

collectibles.title: Mighty Thor - Thor: Love and Thunder
collectibles.description: When the mystical hammer Mjolnir calls out to Dr. Jane Foster, she finds herself unable to resist the pull of destiny. Making her official debut in the MCU as Mighty Thor, Jane's life changes forever as she mysteriously comes to possess the reforged Mjolnir. Sideshow and Hot Toys are thrilled to present Mighty Thor as our next 1:6 scale collectible figure inspired by Marvel Studios' Thor: Love and Thunder.
collectibles.author: Hot Toys

collectibles.title: Ellen Ripley Bonus Version - Aliens 1986
collectibles.description: From warrant officer on the Nostromo to first lieutenant on the USS Sulaco, Ellen Ripley has stood as the gold standard for action movie heroes for the past 36 years! Smart, brash, and no-nonsense, Ripley takes charge of any situation gone wrong.
collectibles.author: Prime 1 Studio and Blitzway

collectibles.title: Scarlet Witch
collectibles.description: The premium format figure of Scarlet Witch stands 29 inches tall as the heroine uses her chaos magic powers to take down the mechanical threat of Ultron. Held aloft on a swirling pink energy base and the destroyed parts of Ultron, Wanda Maximoff displays her mystical power with concentration, determination, and strength unmatched by any man or machine.
collectibles.author: Sideshow

collectibles.title: Batman Who Laughs
collectibles.description: Horrible effigies of heroes like Red Hood, Nightwing, and Batgirl are carved into the cave beneath his boots, as a twisted tribute to Bruce Wayne's mentorship legacy. As a cruel combination of Bruce Wayne and the Joker, this intelligent villain is twisted beyond recognition by the Joker toxin, making him one of the most ruthless sadists the DC Universe has ever known.
collectibles.author: Sideshow

collectibles.title: Hulk and Wolverine - Marvel Maquette
collectibles.description: Sideshow's Hulk and Wolverine maquette is an incredible 3D recreation not only of the pair's first encounter but also of Wolverine's introduction to the world. Captured with stunning detail, the maquette depicts these two fighters locked in an eternal battle. Wolverine soars through the air while Hulk prepares to deliver a blow that could end the fight.
collectibles.author: Sideshow

collectibles.title: Red Ranger - Power Rangers
collectibles.description: Introducing the figure of Jason Lee Scott, who was one of the chosen ones, becoming the first Red Ranger of the modern era and the leader of the group known as the Power Rangers. His symbol is a T-Rex, represented by his red and white suit. He is presented with the sword in hand, ready for battle.
collectibles.author: Sideshow and Iron Studios

collectibles.title: John Constantine
collectibles.description: He is the protagonist of the comic book series Hellblazer from the DC Comics Vertigo imprint. John Constantine, protected from dark supernatural forces within a circle of mystical flames and candles, is the British occult detective with blond hair and stern eyes who plays with fire in his right hand. Stripped of other resources aside from his extensive knowledge and audacity, dressed in his ever-present brown coat, he faces most of his challenges relying primarily on his cunning.
collectibles.author: Sideshow and Iron Studios

collectibles.title: Fred Flintstone
collectibles.description: Sideshow and Iron Studios present the latest from the Art Scale 1:10 line: Fred Flintstone! Based on original references from The Flintstones, this polyresin statue is hand-painted and limited edition.
collectibles.author: Sideshow and Iron Studios

collectibles.title: Alice in Wonderland
collectibles.description: Alice was happily reading under a tree and was driven by curiosity to follow the 'White Rabbit.' Alice ended up entering another world. The Alice statue is highly detailed and designed with high fidelity to the movie, standing at approximately 6 inches tall. This is a great representation of the scene where Alice is depicted in the middle of her fall into this new world, with many of the classic objects like the mirror, chair, book, and the Queen of Hearts' portrait visible as she falls, including the Cheshire Cat with its ever-present eerie smile.
collectibles.author: Beast Kingdom

collectibles.title: Crash Bandicoot
collectibles.description: Crash Bandicoot™ was genetically enhanced by Doctor Neo Cortex. He escaped from Cortex's castle and acts as opposition against Cortex. The most distinctive technique that Crash uses is the one where he spins like a tornado at high speeds and knocks down almost everything he hits.
collectibles.author: Sideshow and First 4 Figures

collectibles.title: Ducktales
collectibles.description: In 1987, the animated TV series 'DuckTales,' the infinitely extravagant animated series, was launched, following the escapades of Huey, Dewey, and Louie, as well as their Uncle Scrooge McDuck, the richest duck in the world. The family is often on the quest for treasure throughout 4 seasons of fun and chaos.
collectibles.author: Beast Kingdom

collectibles.title: Poison Ivy
collectibles.description: Poison Ivy is a fictional character from DC Comics. She is often portrayed as an eco-terrorist with the ability to control plants and produce toxins from her body. Her real name is Pamela Isley, and she is a recurring antagonist in the Batman comic book series.
collectibles.author: Sideshow and Tweeterhead

collectibles.title: Batman and Catwoman
collectibles.description: Stoic as ever, Batman averts his gaze from Selina Kyle, though he can't resist a gentle touch on her waist. His black cape slides down around them, enveloping the pair in their intimate nocturnal embrace. They stand in a warm church, with the orange glow of its directional painting illumination stoking the flames of their nighttime encounter.
collectibles.author: Sideshow

collectibles.title: Batman Life Size Cowl - Batman 1989
collectibles.description: Above Gotham City looms its greatest superhero: Batman™. A wealthy playboy and philanthropist during the day and the city's defender by night, Batman™ comes to life with the 1:1 hood replica from PureArts Batman™!
collectibles.author: PureArts

collectibles.title: Star Wars Home Edition Pinball Machine
collectibles.description: Stern Pinball’s Star Wars™ Pin™ is a new stylish, affordable and fun pinball machine designed and engineered for the home.  Stern’s new Star Wars™ Pin™ immerses players in the dynamic Star Wars™ galaxy.  The Pin™ is packed with features that provide players with an irresistible game experience including select speech and footage from the original Star Wars™ trilogy, color-changing playfield inserts, a custom sculpted Death Star, and a custom sculpted and interactive TIE fighter.
collectibles.author: Stern Pinball’s

collectibles.title: Hasbro Gaming Stranger Things Ouija
collectibles.description: Supernatural forces were uncovered, a young boy was rescued from a parallel dimension, and monsters—both human and otherworldly—were defeated. Gather around the Ouija: Stranger Things Edition game, if you dare, and unlock secrets from a mysterious and mystifying world of the Upside Down. Inspired by the Netflix Original Series, Stranger Things, this game board features the alphabet spelled out with Christmas lights like in the iconic light wall scene from the show (board does not light up). Summon the courage to ask the Ouija board questions about what happened in the Upside Down, as well as anything else you’d like to know. Will the planchette spell out the answers that you seek? Handle the Ouija board with respect, and it won't disappoint you!
collectibles.author: Hasbro

collectibles.title: Monopoly The Simpsons
collectibles.description: Celebrate 30 years of America's favorite cartoon family with this special edition MONOPOLY: The Simpsons board game! Custom-sculpted tokens of Homer (as the Monorail Conductor), Bart, Jebediah Springfield, and even the family dog take players through familiar town locations to buy, sell, and trade their way to being the last fan standing.
collectibles.author: USAOPOLY

collectibles.title: Clue Bobs Burgers
collectibles.description: Join the Belcher family in a 'whodunit' that’s more mindboggling than finding mayonnaise in the microwave. Clue: Bob’s Burgers lets you piece together the answers to who killed 'Ned Boddy', What weapon was left behind, and Which room of the apartment was the scene of the crime! The collectible game is illustrated by the show creators themselves and includes a custom Clue board, six Rumor Cards for each of the suspects, nine locations, and six metal tokens to represent the weapons, which include a Burger Phone, Spatula, Horcelain, Wine Bottle, Kuchi Kopi, and Gene’s Keyboard!
collectibles.author: USAOPOLY

collectibles.title: UNO Super Mario
collectibles.description: Join Mario, Luigi, and all their friends for a special game of UNO! It's the classic UNO you love, but this version also includes a special Mario Super Star Card that makes your character invincible! After another player plays a Draw 2+ or Wild Draw 4+ card, you play the Super Star Card to bounce the power back to that player and make THEM draw two or four cards! Score points by being the first to get rid of all the cards in your hand. First player or team to 500 wins. When you're down to one card, don't forget to yell 'UNO!' Contains 112 cards plus simple instructions. For 2 to 10 players, ages 7 and older. Colors and decorations may vary.
collectibles.author: Mattel

collectibles.title: UNO the Legend of Zelda
collectibles.description: It's the fun, fast-paced card game you love now featuring iconic characters from the Nintendo action/adventure video game series, The Legend of Zelda! Players race to get rid of all their cards by matching a card in their hand with the current card shown on top of the deck. Use the powerful Triforce Wild Card to control the game! When you play this card, you choose the color that will continue play, and the next player must play a card of that color with a Triforce symbol on it! If they don't have one, they have to draw three more cards. Other action cards include Skips, Reverses, Draw Twos, and Wild Cards. First player or team to 500 wins – and when you're down to one card, don't forget to yell 'UNO!' A great gift for Zelda fans, age 7 and older. Contains 112 cards plus instructions. For 2 to 10 players. Colors and decorations may vary.
collectibles.author: Mattel

collectibles.title: UNO Dragon Ball Z
collectibles.description: In UNO Dragon Ball Z , the card game everyone loves gets some international flair. Featuring the characters and Japanese manga graphics of the popular TV series, it also includes a Wild Shenron's Wish Card unique to this deck. As in the classic UNOÒ game, players aim to get rid of all their cards by matching a card in their hand with the current card shown on top of the discard pile. When players are down to one card, they must yell 'UNO!' This special edition of the family-favorite card game makes a great gift for players 7 years and older, especially fans and collectors of Dragon Ball Z and anime. Colors and decorations may vary.
collectibles.author: Mattel

collectibles.title: UNO Star Wars
collectibles.description: The UNO matching card game everyone loves goes to a galaxy far, far away with this special Star Wars edition. Featuring both classic and newer characters spanning the movies of the beloved Skywalker Saga, it also includes 'The Force' wild card unique to this deck. Players aim to get rid of all their cards by matching a card in their hand with the current card shown on top of the discard pile. When players are down to one card, they must prove that the Force is with them by shouting 'UNO!' This edition of the family-favorite card game makes a great gift for players 7 years and older, especially Star Wars fans. Colors and decorations may vary.
collectibles.author: Mattel

collectibles.title: UNO Flip! Stranger Things
collectibles.description: UNO FLIP! flips classic UNO game play with twists like a double-sided deck, special FLIP card and tougher penalties that add a competitive edge…and with a theme inspired by the supernatural TV thriller Stranger Things, fans will really flip over this edition! There is a 'Real World' side to the deck, which plays like the classic UNO game, and an 'Upside Down' side where penalties are super-tough. Play the FLIP card, and all cards in the player's hand, the draw pile and draw deck are flipped over to reveal an entirely new set of numbers and colors on the opposite side. The holder of the FLIP card determines which side to play -and when cards are switched back around. The 'Upside Down' side of the deck includes action cards that really shake things up, like Draw Five and Skip Everyone. Strategize to rattle the competition and be the first to get rid of all cards to win. When players are down to one card, they still can't forget to shout 'UNO!' This fun family card game is perfect for 2 to 10 players ages 7 years old and up, especially fans of the show. Colors and decorations may vary.
collectibles.author: Mattel

collectibles.title: UNO Harry Potter
collectibles.description: It's the fun, fast-paced card game you love now featuring iconic characters from the world of Harry Potter! Join Harry, Hermione, Ron, Professor Dumbledore and more of your favorite characters from Hogwarts for a night of UNO gameplay. Players race to get rid of all their cards by matching a card in their hand with the current card shown on top of the deck. Score points by being the first to get rid of all the cards in your hand. Special action cards deliver game-changing moments as they each perform a function to help you defeat your opponents. There's even a special Sorting Hat Rule Card! When you play this card, another player of your choice must keep drawing cards until they find a Gryffindor card! Other action cards include Skips, Reverses, Draw Twos, and Wild Cards. First player or team to 500 wins and when you're down to one card, don't forget to yell 'UNO!' A great gift for Harry Potter fans, age 7 and older. Contains 112 cards plus instructions. For 2 to 10 players, ages 7 and older. Colors and decorations may vary.
collectibles.author: Mattel

collectibles.title: UNO Masters of the Universe
collectibles.description: The UNO card game everyone loves gets a powerful look with He-Man and the Masters of the Universe. Featuring dynamic graphics of MOTU characters from powerful heroes to deadly sorcerers, it also includes a unique rule -the Power of Greyskull Card. To use it, the player must hold it above their head and say, 'By the power of Greyskull, I have the power!!' All other players then draw 3 cards. Game play is like classic UNO: players match cards by color or number in a race to get rid of all the cards in their hand. When down to one card, they must shout triumphantly like He-Man 'UNO!' This edition of the family-favorite card game makes a great gift for players 7 years and older, especially MOTU fans. Colors and decorations may vary.
collectibles.author: Mattel

collectibles.title: UNO Mario Kart
collectibles.description: The UNO matching card game everyone loves rides into the Mario Kart world of crazy obstacles and racing go-karts! Graphics from the game on every card make this unique pack a collectible for fans. It plays like classic UNO, except every card has an ITEM icon in the corner (Mushroom, Banana Peel, Green Shell, Lightning, or Bomb). The ITEMS don't do anything during normal play. But when the wild Item Box Card is played, the player flips over the top card of the Draw Pile and immediately uses the ITEM on that card! Each ITEM has a different action. This pack makes a great toy for players 7 years and older, especially Mario Kart fans. Colors and decorations may vary.
collectibles.author: Mattel

collectibles.title: UNO Jurassic World
collectibles.description: Just like in the UNO you love, UNO Jurassic World gameplay involves players racing to get rid of all their cards, but this version features cards with Jurassic characters and images and a special rule! You want to match a card in your hand by either color or number with the card shown on top of the deck. and you'll score points for the cards your opponents are left holding. And in UNO Jurassic World, there's also a new type of action card: when you draw Owen's Raptor Squad card, you get to immediately discard every raptor card from your hand! The first player to reach 500 points wins. When you're down to one card, don't forget to yell 'UNO!' Contains 112 cards plus instructions. For 2 to 10 players, ages 7 and older. Easy to pick up, impossible to put down. Colors and decorations may vary.
collectibles.author: Mattel

collectibles.title: UNO Flip! Marvel
collectibles.description: UNO Flip! card game adds an exciting twist to the classic UNO matching card action that everyone loves, and now the action includes heroes and villains from the Marvel universe! Play a Flip card and the deck FLIPS from the Heroes' side to the Villains' side which has penalties that are extra tough. A 'Draw 1' card on the Heroes' side becomes a 'Draw 5' card on the Villains' side! A Heroes' side 'Skip' card becomes a Villains' side 'Skip Everyone' card! Only another Flip card can change things back. And when you're down to one card, don't shout, 'assemble,' shout, 'UNO!' This edition of the family-favorite card game makes a great toy for players 7 years and older, especially Marvel fans. Colors and decorations may vary.
collectibles.author: Mattel

collectibles.title: Pictionary The Simpsons
collectibles.description: The Game of Quick Draw now features five categories ranging from the Nuclear Power Plant to the Simpson Family and Springfield Elementary School. With 2,000 fun Simpsons words to draw, it’s a sure-fire hit with Simpsons fans of all ages!
collectibles.author: USAOPOLY

collectibles.title: Jenga: Super Mario
collectibles.description: Inspired by the beloved Super Mario video games, the Jenga: Super Mario Edition game has players racing up the tower as Mario, Luigi, Peach, or Toad. Each character gets its own character card to refer to throughout the game. Players earn points by collecting coins as they stack, steal, climb, and defeat Bowser. But watch out…if the tower falls on a player's turn, they'll lose coins and it's game over. Spin the spinner to find out the next move: How many layers to climb, how many blocks to remove and stack, whether to collect coins, or whether the game will reverse directions. It's a battle to the top as players move their own pegs up and their opponents' pegs down, all while trying not to make the tower crash. It's a great gaming experience for fans of Super Mario and Jenga alike!
collectibles.author: Hasbro

collectibles.title: Match Marvel Heroes
collectibles.description: Battle alongside fifteen of the greatest Marvel heroes including Captain America, Iron Man, Spider-Woman, Black Widow and Miles Morales in Top Trumps Match, the Crazy Cube Game. Be the first to match five of these incredible Marvel characters in a row, in this awesome twist on the classic matching game. Knock out cubes to disrupt your opponent’s characters while lining up your own - but watch out for the twist! If one of your opponent’s Top Trump cards turns out to match your row of five, they steal the win. Will you soar to victory with Star-Lord, blast away your opponents with Rocket Raccoon or leave them in the dust with Captain Marvel? With officially-licensed artwork, this game is guaranteed to impress children of all ages, and it's contained within a durable, portable carry case so you can take it wherever you go. Perfect for your next journey across the galaxy.
collectibles.author: Top Trumps

collectibles.title: Yahtzee: Donkey Kong
collectibles.description: Get ready to do a barrel roll with America's all-time #1 dice game. This special Donkey Kong Yahtzee includes DK's barrel as the cup and custom dice featuring Donkey Kong icons. Roll your way to victory with classic dice combinations like full house, large straight and five of a kind.
collectibles.author: USAOPOLY

collectibles.title: Marvel Guess Who?
collectibles.description: 2 Game Trays, 4 Supports (2 for each game tray), 4 Character Selectors, 2 Score Sliders, 2 Character Sheets with 24 Small Character Cards, 24 Character Cards, 1 Instruction Sheet
collectibles.author: Winning Moves

collectibles.title: Magic 8 Ball Star Wars
collectibles.description: See the answers inspired by a galaxy far, far away…with the Star Wars Magic 8 Ball -if you're bold enough to question Darth Vader and read his reply! As with the classic version, start by asking the Darth Vader helmet a 'yes' or 'no' question, then turn it over to see the answer magically appear in the window. The themed replies are taken from the Star Wars movies and range from the positive 'You know it to be true' to negative 'Your thoughts betray you.' Seekers will find direction from the light side and the dark side of the Force. The fastest way ever to seek advice! Makes a great gift for collectors and any Star Wars fan 6 years and older. Colors and decorations may vary.
collectibles.author: Mattel

collectibles.title: Connect 4 Marvel Spider-Man
collectibles.description: It's classic Connect 4 gameplay with a Marvel Spider-Man theme! In this Connect 4 strategy game, opponents choose to play as Peter Parker or Miles Morales, in a friendly neighborhood competition to own the grid! Players take turns dropping the discs into the grid, stacking them vertically, horizontally, or diagonally. Use strategy to block opponent’s moves. Who will web their way to victory? The first player to get 4 of their discs in a row wins the game. The Connect 4 game is a fun indoor activity for kids. Bring out the game when the family gets together, and take it along for kids' play dates. The game is for 2 players, ages 6 and up. Copyright 2021 MARVEL. Hasbro Gaming and all related trademarks and logos are trademarks of Hasbro, Inc.
collectibles.author: Hasbro

collectibles.title: Dungeons & Dragons: Stranger Things
collectibles.description: The stranger things Dungeons & dragons starter set contains everything players need to embark on a stranger things adventure including the essential rules of the roleplaying game. It's a great way for new as well as seasoned dungeon & dragons players to experience the D&D adventure stranger things character Mike Wheeler has created for his friends. Pick your character -- will you be will the wise or Dustin the dwarf? Get your fireballs ready as you investigate the mysterious castle and battle The ferocious Demogorgon. Prepare for just about anything, because the game just Got stranger.
collectibles.author: Hasbro

collectibles.title: The Lord of The Rings - Chess Set
collectibles.description: The struggle for the One Ring — bringing good and evil together in the fascinating tale that has made both history and legend. Command the forces of good, led by Galadriel, Aragorn, Frodo and Gandalf the Grey, or wield the forces of evil, including Gollum, the Nazgûl, Saruman, and the Dark Lord Sauron!
collectibles.author: The Noble Collection

collectibles.title: Scrabble The Simpsons
collectibles.description: The Simpsons edition of Scrabble features several rule changes from the regular game. Players can play special cards on their turn to help them or hinder their opponents. Certain words popularized by The Simpsons are permitted (notably KWYJIBO). Also, the bonus squares on the playing board are arranged in a different, irregular pattern.
collectibles.author: Mattel

collectibles.title: Scrabble Star Wars
collectibles.description: This special edition of the Scrabble game lets Star Wars fans enjoy their favorite saga combined with the galaxy's favorite crossword-style game!​
collectibles.author: Mattel

collectibles.title: Captain America Shield
collectibles.description: Iconic in its design and durability, the Captain America red, white, and blue premium role play shield is the ultimate combination of offense and defense! Specifically modeled on the First Avenger’s trademark symbol, the premium role play shield is immediately recognizable, with exceptional detailing and premium finish for play or display. Marvel Legends The Falcon and The Winter Soldier Captain America premium role play shield is a notable addition to any Marvel fan collection. With over 80 years of comic book and movie history, Marvel has become a cornerstone of fan collections around the world. With the Marvel Legends Series, fan favorite Marvel Comic Universe and Marvel Cinematic Universe characters and role play items offer premium detailing for Marvel fans and collectors. Additional items each sold separately. Subject to availability. © 2021 MARVEL. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
collectibles.author: Hasbro

collectibles.title: Iron Spider Electronic Helmet
collectibles.description: Geared up in the Iron Spider armor, Spider-Man is ready for action! Inspired by the Marvel Universe, this Marvel Legends Series 1:1 full-scale premium roleplay item is highly detailed and features electronic lights. This helmet features glowing LED eyes that glow red and blue in 6 different light settings. With premium sculpting and design, this helmet is an impressive addition to any Marvel collection. The helmet interior and the faceplate are detailed to evoke the electronic design, while the exterior boasts a remarkable attention to detail and a beautiful finish. Collectors, fans, and Marvel enthusiasts alike can imagine suiting up to create their own heroic adventures! Copyright 2021 MARVEL. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
collectibles.author: Hasbro

collectibles.title: Thor Mjolnir
collectibles.description: With over 80 years of entertainment history, Marvel has become a cornerstone of fan collections around the world. With the Marvel Legends Series, fan-favourite Marvel Comic Universe and Marvel Cinematic Universe characters are designed with premium detail and articulation for posing and displaying in collections. Now in the hands of the Mighty Thor, the legendary and all-powerful hammer, Mjolnir, is one of the most iconic weapons in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Marvel Legends proudly presents this 1:1 scale reproduction of Mjolnir as it appears in Marvel Studios’ Thor: Love and Thunder! With film-accurate sculpt and detailing across the hammer, including unique texturing across the hammerhead to reflect its appearance in the film, this is the next essential Marvel Legends roleplay item for your collection! Trigger the film-inspired lights and sound FX and imagine unleashing the thunder of the gods! Additional items each sold separately. Subject to availability. Copyright 2021 MARVEL. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
collectibles.author: Hasbro

collectibles.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier Stealth Shield
collectibles.description: Science made Steve Rogers a super-soldier, and his stealth shield protects him on missions. With over 80 years of comic book and movie history, Marvel has become a cornerstone of fan collections around the world. With the Marvel Legends Series, fan favorite Marvel Comic Universe and Marvel Cinematic Universe characters and role play items offer premium detailing for Marvel fans and collectors. Additional items each sold separately. Subject to availability.
collectibles.author: Hasbro

collectibles.title: Stormtrooper Helmet
collectibles.description: Specialized soldiers in the Imperial forces, artillery stormtroopers carry specialized indirect fire weapons like mortars onto the battlefield Fans can imagine the biggest battles and missions in the Star Wars saga with premium roleplay items from Star Wars The Black Series! With exquisite features and decoration, this series embodies the quality and realism that Star Wars devotees love. This roleplay item with premium deco, realistic detail, and series-inspired design is a great addition to any Star Wars fan’s collection. Featuring a voice changer that distorts the wearer’s voice to sound like an Artillery Stormtrooper from the Star Wars: The Mandalorian live-action series on Disney Plus, fans can imagine what it was like for these specialized troopers to suit up for battle! Star Wars products are produced by Hasbro under license from Lucasfilm Ltd. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
collectibles.author: Hasbro

collectibles.title: Power Gauntlet
collectibles.description: The 6 Infinity stones contain within them the power to control and contort the fabric of the universe. In this gauntlet, the powers of the Infinity stones are combined to create a weapon with unfathomable capabilities. Imagine possessing incredible, reality-altering abilities with the Marvel Legends series electronic power gauntlet. Copyright 2019 Marvel.
collectibles.author: Hasbro

collectibles.title: Iron Man Nano Gauntlet
collectibles.description: With over 80 years of entertainment history, Marvel has become a cornerstone of fan collections around the world. With the Marvel Legends Series, fan favorite Marvel Comic Universe and Marvel Cinematic Universe characters are designed with premium detail and articulation for posing and display in collections. Desperate heroes. Six Stones. One chance to save the universe. Bring one of the most powerful weapons in the Marvel Universe to life with this premium Iron Man Nano Gauntlet Articulated Electronic Fist from the Marvel Legends series. Wield the power of the Infinity Stones and imagine saving the entire universe with just a snap of your fingers. At 18 inches tall, this electronic fist features flexible finger articulation, lights, and sounds, including movie-inspired Snap! and 6 removable light-up Infinity Stones.
collectibles.author: Hasbro

collectibles.title: Infinity Gauntlet
collectibles.description: A Mad Titan. Six Infinity Stones that control the multi verse. One mission to destroy the galaxy, another to save it. A team of heroes ready for the fight. Whoever wields the Infinity Gauntlet wields the fate of the universe Bring one of the most powerful weapons in the Marvel Universe to life With this premium Infinity Gauntlet Articulated Electronic Fist from the Marvel Legends Series, lift up the power of the Infinity Stones and imagine taking control of the galaxy with the notorious gauntlet worn by the supreme being, Thanos. Inspired by the upcoming Avengers: Infinity War movie, this Infinity Gauntlet from the Marvel Legends Series features premium design and styling, as well as intricate detailing on the gauntlet and 6 light up Infinity Stones. Features pulsating light effects, movie inspired sounds, and individually articulated finger movement, as well as a fist lock feature for display. Copyright 2017 MARVEL. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
collectibles.author: Hasbro

collectibles.title: Iron Man Helmet
collectibles.description: For years, Tony Stark has been trouncing evildoers and thwarting nefarious schemes in the guise of the Invincible Iron Man. The ever-evolving high-tech armor, in combination with Stark’s own bravery and sense of justice, proves itself a formidable foe of wrongdoing. The Marvel’s Legends Series is dedicated to providing fans with exceptional action figures and choice Premium Role Play collectibles. The Iron Man Electronic Helmet is a perfect addition to the brand - built with the serious Marvel true believer in mind.
collectibles.author: Hasbro

collectibles.title: Black Panther Helmet
collectibles.description: With over 80 years of entertainment history, Marvel has become a cornerstone of fan collections around the world. With the Marvel Legends Series, fan favorite Marvel Comic Universe and Marvel Cinematic Universe characters are designed with premium detail and articulation for posing and display in collections. The Black Panther is the ordained ruler and protector of Wakanda, the most technologically advanced nation on earth, the armor and helmet serving as symbols of office as much as protective gear. Marvel Legends proudly presents this 1:1 scale reproduction of Black Panther’s helmet as it appears in Marvel Studios’ Black Panther! With movie-accurate sculpting and detailing across the helmet, this is the next essential Marvel Legends Role Play item for your collection! Trigger the flip-up/flip-down lenses and movie-inspired light FX and imagine Black Panther springing into action! Additional items each sold separately. Subject to availability. Copyright 2022 MARVEL. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
collectibles.author: Hasbro

collectibles.title: Boba Fett Helmet
collectibles.description: Once regarded as one of the most fearsome and capable bounty hunters in the galaxy, Boba Fett seemingly met his demise in the Sarlacc pit on Tatooine. Fett has survived the beast and has now reclaimed his distinctive Mandalorian armor. Commemorate the live-action return of fan-favorite character Boba Fett with The Black Series Boba Fett (Re-Armored) Premium Electronic Helmet, inspired by the streaming series The Mandalorian on Disney+! This roleplay item with premium deco, realistic detail, and series-inspired design is a great addition to any Star Wars fan’s collection. Featuring a flip-down rangefinder with flashing LED lights and an illuminated heads-up display (HUD), fans can imagine what it was like for the famous bounty hunter to reclaim his iconic armor and suit up for galactic action alongside The Mandalorian! Star Wars products are produced by Hasbro under license from Lucasfilm Ltd. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
collectibles.author: Hasbro

collectibles.title: Batman Arkham City Joker Costume
collectibles.description: The Joker is the villainous psychopathic madman from the very famous Batman franchise. Become The Joker with this Batman The Joker Costume for Adults. This costume features a Joker half mask, purple jacket with attached vest, purple pinstriped pants and white gloves. Some people just want to see the world burn and other just want the perfect costume for Halloween. You can have the latter with this ensemble right here!
collectibles.author: Rubies

collectibles.title: Iron Man Deco Light
collectibles.description: Bring your favorite Marvel superheroes into your home and get closer to the action like never before! These cordless, battery operated decorative wall lights appear to break out of your wall with a fun 3D cracked effect. They're simple to install and are COOL - never getting hot to the touch. With energy safe LED bulbs, you'll enjoy it for hours without ever having to change the bulbs. Takes 3-AA batteries (not included).
collectibles.author: 3D Light FX

collectibles.title: Jurassic Park Night Vision Goggles
collectibles.description: The life-size prop replica from Jurassic Park that everyone has been waiting for is finally here! Presenting the first-ever, officially licensed 1:1 Jurassic Park Goggles prop replica! And just like in the movie, these light up. Now you can relive the moment Tim finds these awesome Goggles in the vehicle shortly before the T. Rex makes her grand entrance.
collectibles.author: Chronicle Collectibles

collectibles.title: Ghostbusters Trap Incense Burner
collectibles.description: ​How is anyone supposed to relax with a bunch of ghosts running around? Now you can with this official Ghostbusters Trap Incense Burner, modeled after the iconic ghost trap seen in the films! Simply light an incense and place it in the incense cup inside and relax as fragrant incense smoke seeps out the trap doors smoothly.
collectibles.author: Numskull
